titleStmt.title: W. C. Hite to James F. Robinson
CWG7856

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
D. S. BENEDICT, President.
W. C. HITE, Cashier.
Office COMMERCIAL BANK of KENTUCKY.
Louisville, Ky., 12 Jany 1863.
His Excellency Esq., Cashier,
J F Robinson Frankfort Ky
Dear Sir:
This Branch of the Commercial Bk Ky having appointed David L Fullerton, clerk of the Branch, I would respectfully ask that you appoint him a Notary Public for Jefferson County Ky & much oblige

Yours Respectfully
W. C. Hite
Cash,
